title: Exquisite Polki & Gemstone Chandbali - A Timeless Telugu Classic
materials: and Faceted Gemstone Drops (Tourmaline & Peridot). Exhibits Hyderabadi Zardosi Polish for a rich
features: A classic Chandbali design featuring a central circular motif meticulously adorned with Polki diamonds in a closed setting. The Polki stones are arranged in a floral pattern, exuding traditional elegance. Delicate pearl and gemstone drops are gracefully suspended along the bottom edge, enhancing the ethereal beauty. The earrings feature a 'kaan chain' provision (chain attachment to the hair), typical of traditional Telugu bridal jewellery.
colors: and a Vibrant Palette of Green (Peridot) and Pink/Red (Tourmaline) gemstone drops.
occasions: and grand celebratory events. Also suitable for adding a touch of heritage elegance to sophisticated modern outfits.
description: This Chandbali is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The use of uncut Polki diamonds adds a royal touch, while the colourful gemstone drops offer a contemporary twist. The piece represents timeless elegance and impeccable craftsmanship, making it a treasured heirloom for generations. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its quality and brilliance, reflecting our commitment to excellence.
